code: @Test public void runWhenSpringIntegrationIsNotEnabledShouldNotHaveEndpointBean() {     ApplicationContextRunner noSpringIntegrationRunner = new ApplicationContextRunner().withConfiguration(AutoConfigurations.of(IntegrationGraphEndpointAutoConfiguration.class)).     noSpringIntegrationRunner.run((context) -> {         assertThat(context).doesNotHaveBean(IntegrationGraphEndpoint.class).         assertThat(context).doesNotHaveBean(IntegrationGraphServer.class).     }). }
